About Me

My name is Jason. I am an Electrical Technician from South Carolina. I grew up through my teen years lifting weights and boxing. When I turned 18, I quit exercising altogether and started trying to figure out what I wanted to do with my life after graduating high school. One thing led to another and I hit a very low point in my life in 2019. I spent a whole year of my life depressed and overeating junk food. After a year, I got sick of looking at who I had become. In the mirror, I remember vowing to myself "Tomorrow, you are going to change your life for the better". After that day, the rest is history. I joined a gym and consistantly lifted weights and ran for 4 years now (and counting). I never knew how much exercise could help with depression until now. Now I want to help others on their fitness journies. I hope you will find this website useful. If you have any questions or ideas, please refer to the "Contact" section.
